(Ok, the events in the Shadow Destiny post did happen and Australia is now a 
Techno-organic terrain. Thanks Alloran!)

Gesper maneuvered the ship and entered Earth's atmosphere. The ship shivered 
but successfully made its entry and headed towards the newly reformatted 
Australia.

Gesper:
We are on target. Landing site: former Simpsons Desert. Basic techno-organic 
vegetation. Wildlife: adapted to the new environnment, but still organic. 
This is it, commander.

Belthassan:
Excellent. You know what your job is, brother...

Gesper didn't need to be explained. Although the reformatting process had 
been a total surprise, it would also permit to his ship to be deployed as a 
base. Power, fluids, nutriments, everything would be provided by the new 
soil. But there was one thing he would regret: if the Shadow Destiny 
transformed into a base, it wouldn't fly for a long time...

Melchana:
I have located the Hellgate; location: grid Asuna-Typhendrix, vector 39406. 
Message sent to lieutenant Daemos.

Belthassan:
Brace yourself for the landing, get me your report after, please...

The ship came downon its whale-like belly. Its wings rested fully extended 
on each side of it. The transformation then started. An eerie dark glow was 
emitted by the ship's core. When it disappeared, a tall tower stood, and the 
two wings now formed a crescent-like barrier from it. Several vegetal wires 
connected it to the ground, providing everything it needed.

Gesper:
Base establishment complete. The reformatting cannon is depleted and the 
transformation has damaged it. It is now useless.
...
Brother and sister, welcome to Earth!
